titleStmt.title: Receipt (Certificate) for work performed for the penthemeral dyke corv»®e
titleStmt.author: [- - -]; [. . .]on, antigrapheus

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The fourth year of Nero Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus Imperator. Has performed the penthemeros on the dikes for the same year (2nd hand) in the Pholemis canal, on behalf of Theadelphia: Harpatotoes, son of Aunes. (3rd hand) [I, . . ., have signed in respect] of Harpatotoes, son of Aunes, having worked from the 14th(?).;(4th hand) I, [. . .]on, antigrapheus in charge of dikes, from the office of the strategos, have signed.

listBibl.bibl: Browne GM, CE 45, 135-139, 1970, Plate -- SB XII 10807 Browne GM, PMich XII, 654, 1975 -- BL VII,116 (l. 7-8, 9). - L. 8 (9 in the ed.): read str(ategou) rather than b(asilikou) gr(ammateos). (PH + TG)
